steps: Rinse black urad dal and kidney beans (if using) under cold water until water runs clear
Add dal, kidney beans, water, bay leaves, garlic, ginger, and salt to Instant Pot
Close lid and cook on high pressure for 30 minutes
Open lid and remove bay leaves; use back of spoon to gently mash some of the dal to create creamy texture while leaving most lentils intact
Set Instant Pot to saut√© mode and add ghee
Add cumin seeds and let sizzle for 30 seconds
Add onion (if using) and cook until softened, about 3-4 minutes
Stir in tomato paste, turmeric, coriander, cumin, garam masala, cayenne, and salt; cook for 1 minute
Add this tempering mixture to the cooked dal and stir well
Stir in Greek yogurt and half-and-half until well combined
Simmer for 5-10 minutes, stirring occasionally, until dal reaches desired consistency
Turn off heat and stir in final garam masala
Serve garnished with fresh cilantro, alongside rice or naan
title: Dal Makhani
